medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain following a history of food poisoning.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 week ago after 'food poisoning,' with diffuse abdominal pain that worsens with eating. Patient experienced some improvement after taking mefenamic acid. Symptoms persisted with the addition of fever, chills, tachycardia, vomiting, and diarrhea which occurred 2 days prior, relieved by loperamide.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Idiopathic childhood jaundice at unspecified age, never recurred, unknown treatment.
